item.title: Laura add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "You don’t know what goes on in anyone’s life but your own. And when you mess with one part of a person’s life, you’re not messing with just that part. Unfortunately, you can’t be that precise and selective. When you mess with one part of a person’s life, you’re messing with their entire life. Everything. . . affects everything." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Laura add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Don't think or judge, just listen." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Laura add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "I am coming to terms with the fact that loving someone requires a leap of faith, and that a soft landing is never guaranteed." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Laura add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It's a lot easier to be lost than found. It's the reason we're always searching and rarely discovered--so many locks not enough keys." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Laura add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "It's funny how someone's perception of you can be formed without you even knowing it." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Laura add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "I couldn't tell her. I couldn't tell anyone. As long as I didn't say it aloud, it wasn't real." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Laura add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "I was running from one problem or place to another, with no time left to study, or sleep, or just <i>breathe.</i> I felt pulled in all directions, fighting to keep all these obligations circling in the air above me. It was only a matter of time before something fell." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Laura add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "When people don't express themselves, they die one piece at a time." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Laura add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "I wonder how long it would take for anyone to notice if I just stopped talking." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Laura add a quote by Speak
item.description: "If something is eating at you, you gotta find a way to use it." -- Speak
